page.title: 04DWELLING SURVEY
page.content: A survey of the dwellings was done by the children to count and describe the types of houses in which people live. TYPE OF HOUSE. NUMBER IN THE VILLAGE. Detached . 230 Semi-Detached 221 Bungalows 79 Cottages 29 ______________________________________ PUBLIC BUILDINGS SHOPS . Doctors Surgery Butcher 2No. Public House 2No. Foodstore 2No Church Carvery. Building Society. Antique. Schools 2No. Ironmongers. Telephone Exchange. Wool Shop. Chapel Post Office. Dairy Garage. Hairdressers. Electric Substation. Tool Hire. Farms 3 No. Sewage Works Garage.
